and handling (new filter criterias)

on 29.1.2004 SCR5235 implemented by Jin
-- Where clause for CLNA selection
-- Reverse factoring
... filter on reverse factoring debtor
-- Normal factoring

ExpSyntax.val: ' AND CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT101_ADMNO=ADMN_NO and ADMN_DELCREDERE='&'''N'''&' and ADMN_COUNTCREDITLIMITS='&'''Y'''
' AND ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO AND ADMN_DELCREDERE = ''N'' AND ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = ''N'''
Trim ({0,21})&' and (CLNT212_FCI = 0 or CLNT212_FCI <> 0 and CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC <> 0) and CLNT404_ADVANCESVIAIBOL = '&''''&'N'&''''
RTrim ({0,21})&' and (CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE is null or CLNT803_CONTRACTTERMDATE > '''&DStr (Date (),'YYYY-MM-DD')&''')'

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT, CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT110_NAME1, CLNT404_ADVANCEAUTOMATIC, CLNT404_ADVANCEAUTOTEST, CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT,CLNT402_ADVANCE,CLNT402_DEDUCTION,CLNT614_INTERESTUPFRONT, CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO, CMON_YEAR, CMON_MONTH, CMON_CURRENCY, CMON_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC, COFF206_EMPLOYEEINVOICE, CLNT203_OFFICE FROM :1/CLNT cross join :1/ADMN LEFT OUTER JOIN :1/CMON ON (CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO AND CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO AND CMON_YEAR = :2 AND CMON_MONTH = :3 AND CMON_CURRENCY = CLNT108_ACC_CURR) LEFT OUTER JOIN :1/COFF ON (COFF_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO AND COFF_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO AND COFF_CODE = CLNT203_OFFICE) WHERE :4 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: Calculation of v.SETTELMENT and v.CONCETRATION are only made in case of
up front clients (CLNT614_INTERSTUPFRONT="Y" or GSBU_YESNO (2027) = "Y" )

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT CLNA_ADMNO, CLNA_CLNTNO, CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED, CLNA_ID, CLNA_AADVANCE, CLNA_CURRENCY, CLNA_TYPE, CLNA_APPROVALDATECLIMNGR, CLNA_BANKNAME, CLNA_APPROVALDATEDEPTMNGR,CLNA_APPROVAL_ALLOWED FROM :1 WHERE CLNA_ADMNO = :2 AND CLNA_CLNTNO = :3 AND CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'N' :4 ORDER BY CLNA_ID FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
